item.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong is breaking Steam, Nintendo’s eShop
item.description: Valve’s usually stable platform struggles thanks in part to lack of pre-loading options.

item.title: Explaining the Internet’s obsession with Silksong, which (finally) comes out Sept. 4
item.description: Hollow Knight fans found strange ways to cope with impatience and anticipation.
